valueItems.name: CLS → PandaDoc Document Sync (Client Services)
valueItems.description: Automated data sync from CLS to PandaDoc for document generation. 987 merge fields mapped.

valueItems.name: Demand Letter Automation (Client Services)
valueItems.description: Auto-generate demand letters from CLS data, route to signing queue, track 10-day response window.

valueItems.name: LAM Document Review Routing (Legal)
valueItems.description: Smart bucket routing for attorney review — documents auto-sorted by type, priority, and assigned reviewer.

valueItems.name: Attorney Signature Workflow (Hearing Dept)
valueItems.description: Chain of signatures automation: document complete → next reviewer auto-assigned → notification → deadline tracking.

valueItems.name: I-PERFORM Court Filing Submission (Document Team)
valueItems.description: Auto-submit completed documents to I-PERFORM (Provana) for e-filing. ~300 suits filed/day.

valueItems.name: Garnishment Data Entry (Accounting)
valueItems.description: Auto-populate garnishment data from court returns into CLS. Eliminates calculator + manual entry.

valueItems.name: Filing Deadline Risk Mitigation (Legal)
valueItems.description: Automated deadline tracking and alerts for court filing deadlines. Missed deadlines = lost claims.

valueItems.name: Increased Placement Capacity (Client Services)
valueItems.description: Remove client onboarding bottleneck. Automation enables taking on more client placements without adding headcount.

valueItems.name: Import/Export File Processing (Client Services)
valueItems.description: Automate FTP file transfers between CLS and client systems. Currently failing 3-4 times/week.

valueItems.name: Media Movement Automation (Client Services)
valueItems.description: Automate document routing from Paper Vision to clients via FTP. 500-1,000 docs/day processed manually.

valueItems.name: Missing Media Tracking (Client Services)
valueItems.description: Auto-track requested media across multiple spreadsheets and Paper Vision. Delays demand letters 3-4 weeks.

valueItems.name: LexisNexis Consumer Scrubs (Research)
valueItems.description: Batch consumer data validation through LexisNexis API. Manual lookup process for skip tracing.

valueItems.name: Cross-client file transfer monitoring (all clients)
valueItems.description: Automated monitoring across ALL client file transfers. Alerting on failures before they become client escalations.

valueItems.name: Submission log auditing across Trak, MCM, Velocity
valueItems.description: Automated auditing of submission logs across major clients. Catches missed coding, failed submissions, high rejection volumes.

valueItems.name: Client-specific file routing and exception handling
valueItems.description: Each client has unique file format requirements, naming conventions, and exception handling rules.

valueItems.name: Rejection tracking and auto-remediation across clients
valueItems.description: Track rejection volumes across all submission channels. Auto-flag for investigation and attempt common remediation.

valueItems.name: Client Retention Risk Mitigation (largest client raised concerns)
valueItems.description: Largest client raised concerns about inconsistencies — automation prevents escalations.

valueItems.name: Growth Capacity — Onboard New Clients Without Adding Headcount
valueItems.description: Remove client onboarding bottleneck. Automation enables onboarding new clients without proportional ops headcount.

valueItems.name: vExchange diagnostic investigation time (Charmaine + team)
valueItems.description: Automate Charmaine Pool's manual daily investigation of vExchange submission failures to MCM and Velocity.

valueItems.name: Reduced client escalation from submission failures
valueItems.description: Reduced client escalation from submission failures via proactive monitoring and auto-remediation.

valueItems.name: Debtor sheet manual collation & formatting
valueItems.description: Transform LexisNexis Accurint batch data into standardized one-page debtor sheets for garnishment service.

valueItems.name: IT Inspired automation maintenance reduction
valueItems.description: Eliminating $120K/year in outside IT automation maintenance costs. Zapier eliminates root causes at 1/3 the cost.
